title.narrative: Integrating School Health in Liberia

description.narrative: To contribute to the health outcomes of school-age children in Liberia, through development and implementation of integrated school screening programmes

participating-org.narrative: London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine

receiver-org.narrative: Phebe Hospital and School of Nursing
